CourseName: Build Web Apps with Js 3& Firebase
Description: Learn Vue JS 3 & Firebase creating & deploying web apps (including AUthentication).
popups: Learn how to create Vue 3 appications from the ground-up
Get in depth knowledge of Vue features like the Vue Router,Vue CLI,options API,composition API,Teleport etc
Get hands -on & depth experience using the latest Vue 3 features (such as composition API)

CourseName: Modern JavaScript (Complete guide,from Novice to Ninja)
Description: Learn Modern JavaScript from very start to ninja-level & build awsome JavaScript applications.
popups: Learn how to program with modern JavaScript ,from the very begining to more advanced options
Learn all about OOP(object oriented programming) with JavaScript,working with prototypes and classes
Learn to how to create real-world-front-end application with JavaScript(quizes,weather apps,chat rooms etc

CourseName: Build Web Apps with React & Firebase
Description: Learn React from the ground up to make dynamic websites(includes Context,Hooks,Reducers, Routing,AUth,Databases).
popups: Learn how to create modern and dynamic React websites from the ground-up
Learn how to implement a database, authentication &file uploads with React and Firebase

CourseName: Build Data Visualization with D3.js & Firebase
Description: Learn how o use D3(v5)& Firebase(Firestore) to create dynamic SVG data visualizations.Bar charts,pie charts...
popups: Learn D3 JS & Firebase from the ground-up
Create data driven visualizations(graphs, charts,diagrams) with D3 JS
Store (and retrieve) data in a real-time database clled firestore(firebase

Description: Master ANgular (formerly'Angular 2') and build awesome,reactive apps with the successor of Angular.js.
popups: Learn modern Angular,including standalone componenets & signals from the groun up & in great detail
Learn how to send HTTP requests ,implement routing,authenticate users or hanle complex forms-and much more!
Develop modern,complex,responsive and scalable web applications with Angular
